programme.title: R.M.N. _ Kall vinter
programme.desc: Ett drama som utspelar sig i en liten by i Transsylvanien dar spanningar uppstår nar en grupp utlandska arbetare anlander for att arbeta i en fabrik. Den lokala befolkningen stalls infor sina fordomar och radslor, vilket leder till konflikter och djupgående sprickor. Regi: Cristian Mungiu. I rollerna: Marin Grigore, Judith State, Macrina Barladeanu, Mark Blenyesi, Andrei Finţi m.fl. (R.M.N.)

programme.title: Mwuana _ framfor allt
programme.desc: Rapparen Mwuana står infor sitt livs storsta utmaning: att overtraffa sitt hyllade debutalbum "Triller". Dokumentaren foljer artisten i en kamp mot klockan och hans egna demoner. For att overleva som artist måste han bryta sig loss från det morker som en gång drev hans kreativitet och framgång (med hitlåtar som "Craftmanship" och "Loverman"). Kommer Mwuana att finna ett nytt ljus och skapa ett masterverk, eller kommer pressen att bli hans fall? Svensk dokumentar från 2024 av Martin Sandin och Viktor Annerstål.

programme.title: Dream Team
programme.desc: Framgångarna under OS i Barcelona ger NBA-spelarna en ny sorts stjarnstatus som inte ar helt latt att hantera. Samtidigt kampar efterfoljande generationer med att leva upp till de forvantningar som 1992 års dromlag skapade. En ny era.

programme.title: Sportnytt
programme.desc: De senaste sportnyheterna, analyserna och fordjupningarna.

programme.title: Mwuana _ framfor allt
programme.desc: Rapparen Mwuana står infor sitt livs storsta utmaning: att overtraffa sitt hyllade debutalbum "Triller". Dokumentaren foljer artisten i en kamp mot klockan och hans egna demoner. For att overleva som artist måste han bryta sig loss från det morker som en gång drev hans kreativitet och framgång (med hitlåtar som "Craftmanship" och "Loverman"). Kommer Mwuana att finna ett nytt ljus och skapa ett masterverk, eller kommer pressen att bli hans fall? Svensk dokumentar från 2024 av Martin Sandin och Viktor Annerstål.

programme.title: Gudstjanst
programme.desc: Dagens gudstjanst kommer ifrån Missionskyrkan i Varnamo. Predikar gor pastor Britta Bolmenas och gudstjansten leds av Carolina Sandqvist, barn-, familj- och ungdomspastor. Koren Lingon and Mjolk och barnkoren Smulorna står for sång och musik.

programme.title: BBC Proms
programme.desc: Sasongens promenadkonserter i London avslutas på sedvanligt vis med festkonserten från Royal Albert Hall. Utover storslagen tonprakt kan vi forstås som vanligt forvanta oss pompa och ståt med vajande flaggor, ballonger, glitter och knasiga hattar. Sakari Oramo ar tillbaka på pulten framfor BBCs symfoniorkester och årets båda gastsolister, den amerikanska sopranen Angel Blue och den brittiska pianisten Stephen Hough. På programmet musik av bl a Puccini, Ives, Faure och Saint-Saëns. Och så forstås alla allsångsklassikerna!

programme.title: Älvar
programme.desc: Resan langs Indalsalven ar lika mycket en fard i historia som i nutid, dar alven ar konstanten. Med praktfulla vyer over alvslandskapet moter vi manniskor och fenomen som då liksom nu beror av alvens kraft.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Återigen tillbaka på Biskopens palats i Wells valtrar sig ganget i Faberge-smycken, en tallrik av Pugin och en gitarr som tillhorde en av de soldater som aldrig återvande från landstigningen i Normandie.

programme.title: Monsterberattaren Wanja Djanaieff
programme.desc: Wanja Djanaieff ar en av vår tids mest betydande designers som i over 60 år skapat ikoniska monster. Nar hon frågade sin son, dokumentarfilmaren Niklas Djanaieff, om han ville folja henne med sin kamera så tvekade han inte - vilket resulterade i 25 års filmmaterial. Men hur gor man en film om sin egen mamma, som dessutom aldrig satter punkt och slutar att jobba? Nar en ung Wanja borjade sin karriar som monstertecknare 1961, bidrog hon till att forma det moderna designeryrket och har en sjalvklar plats i svensk mode- och designhistoria. Genom att arbeta med 22 noggrant utvalda favoritfarger har hon skapat en unik och igenkannbar fargglad stil. Hennes tidstypiska monster från 60- och 70-talet forestallande blomsterangar, svanar och fikapauser ar idag designklassiker. Wanja Djanaieff har haft många roller genom åren, daribland konstnar, designchef på NK och professor på Konstfack i Stockholm. Svensk dokumentar från 2024 av Niklas Djanaieff.

programme.title: Rapport
programme.desc: Rapport ar Sveriges storsta nyhetsprogram.

programme.title: 15 minuter från Uutiset
programme.desc: Finskt nyhetsprogram om aktuella och angelagna frågor som beror sverigefinnar. Fordjupande reportage, politiska debatter och samtal i studion.

programme.title: Taani talunik
programme.desc: Det har gått tio år sedan halmtaket blev klart på Kastanjegården. Nu måste takåsen bytas ut, så Frank och Theresa satter igång med att vrida ålgras. Det har varit ett bra appelår, och de många literna cider måste tappas om.

programme.title: Anslagstavlan
programme.desc: Korta filmer med samhallsinformation.

programme.title: Kortfilmsklubben - engelska
programme.desc: Unhinged. Irlandsk kortfilm. Nar en osaker millennial får syn på sin stora foralskelse på en dejtingapp borjar hon analysera varje detalj i jakt på bekraftelse. De ar kollegor och samma kvall ska de ses på hans avskedsfest. Men samhallets hårda kroppsideal gor det svårt att våga ta steget, trots att kanslorna verkar omsesidiga. Regi: Zoë Brennan-Whitmore. UR.

programme.title: Kortfilmsklubben - franska
programme.desc: Les coeurs en chien. Det ar sen eftermiddag, Ana och Oceane vantar utanfor en biograf. De har planerat att gå och se den senaste storfilmen tillsammans med Theo och Samy. Medan Ana och Samy redan dejtar ar det for Oceane och Theo deras forsta dejt. Kanske den forsta av många. Eller ar allt bara ett spel från Theos sida? Regi: Leo Fontaine. UR.

programme.title: Finska med Liam
programme.desc: Presentera sig sjalv på finska. Sasongstart. Liam får jobb på ett kontor och lar sig ord som ar bra att kunna på en arbetsplats och nar man ska presentera sig for nya manniskor. UR.

programme.title: Best friends for a day
programme.desc: Meeting Lebopo. Svenska Noel ar på resa i Botswana, dar han ska lara kanna tre olika ungdomar och dela deras vardagsliv under ett dygn. Den har gången tillbringar han ett dygn med Lebopo. Hon bor i ett villakvarter i huvudstaden Gaborone, gillar konst och musik, och har ett stort kompisgang som hon garna festar med. UR.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp Nove Mestos, naised
programme.desc: Varldscupen i skidskytte från Nove Mesto i Tjeckien. På programmet står damernas stafett.

programme.title: Vinterstudio
programme.desc: Vinterstudion ar magasinsprogrammet dar du foljer varldens basta skidskyttar i varldscupen och i masterskap, långloppsstjarnornas kamp i Ski Classics och givetvis får senaste nytt kring hur det går och vad som hander i vintersportvarlden. I studion: Mona Brorsson och Mathias Fredriksson.

programme.title: Yleisurheilun halli EM, iltakilpailut
programme.desc: Inomhus-EM i friidrott från nederlandska Apeldoorn. Direkt från det avslutande finalpasset. Finaler i bl.a. damkula, 3 000 m dam och herr, 4 x 400 dam och herr och avslutningen på femkampen.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Från farskvattensjoar i djungeln till det oppna havets stora, morka djup. Har har daggdjuren hittat otroliga satt att overvinna utmaningarna som foljer ett liv i vatten.

programme.title: Älgfansen
programme.desc: Gitarrbyggaren Michael från England lar sig svenska i Den stora algvandringen-chatten. Hans karlek till slow-tv-algarna har efter flera års hårt arbete resulterat i en valdigt speciell gitarr.

programme.title: Babel
programme.desc: Danska forfattarstjarnan Helle Helles kritikerrosade roman, Hafni berattar, nominerades till Nordiska rådets litteraturpris. Boken skildrar en roadtrip genom Danmark, och från en rastplats ringer Hafni till bokens berattare och berattar att hon ska skiljas. Forfattarpanelen med skådespelaren och forfattaren Jonas Karlsson, poeten Aya Kanbar och serietecknaren Nina Hemmingsson har bokcirkel om Kerstin Thorvalls kultroman Det mest forbjudna.

programme.title: Cyklopernas land
programme.desc: Några av landets smartaste kulturhjarnor tar sig an stora och små frågor från veckan som passerat. Det blir upplysande och kul snack, vassa meningsutbyten, intellektuella djupdyk och helt vanligt trams. Christopher Garplind leder panelen med namn som Amie Bramme-Sey, Tone Schunnesson, Moa Wallin, Messiah Hallberg, Evelyn Mok, Emil Persson, Angelica Cisalli och Linnea Wikblad.

programme.title: Rapport
programme.desc: Rapport ar Sveriges storsta nyhetsprogram.

programme.title: Agenda
programme.desc: Direktsant fordjupande samhallsprogram om aktuella handelser i Sverige och varlden.

programme.title: Secrets of the Spy Whale
programme.desc: Nar en till synes tam vitval narmade sig en fiskebåt i Norge i april 2019 vackte den sallskapliga valen stor uppmarksamhet. Och nar det visade sig att valen, som lekfullt fick namnet Hvaldimir, bar en sele med markningen "Equipment St Petersburg" tatnade mysteriet. Var Hvaldimir rysk spion? Finns det fler djur som anvants på liknande satt? Losningen på mysteriet.

programme.title: Gudstjanst
programme.desc: Dagens gudstjanst kommer ifrån Missionskyrkan i Varnamo. Predikar gor pastor Britta Bolmenas och gudstjansten leds av Carolina Sandqvist, barn-, familj- och ungdomspastor. Koren Lingon and Mjolk och barnkoren Smulorna står for sång och musik.

programme.title: Labi kodumaa
programme.desc: Ett eget hus del 2. Jari och Janis fardigheter i att bygga ett eget hus okar allteftersom deras forskningsresa framskrider. Jari vet att man ska satta krut i stommen for att slippa loss och Jani minns att "vagglisten doljer kast i måtten". Ingredienserna for ett lyckat byggprojekt verkar vara klara. UR.

programme.title: Med våra ogon
programme.desc: Elitsimmare, djurskotare och lavagrottor. Sasongstart. Vi traffar Sigrún som ar tavlingssimmare, upplever naturliga underverk i grottan Raufarholshellir och bevittnar Ísak Ólis konsthantverk. UR.

programme.title: Livet ar kort, konsten lång _ filmen om Åke Goransson
programme.desc: Dokumentar om den mystiske Goteborgskoloristen Åke Goransson (1902-1942), vars korta enstoriga liv leder in i en spannande resa till det forflutna. Instangd med sin mamma i en enrumslagenhet i gamla Landala, avskarmad från varlden och i total fattigdom, målade Åke tavlor som ar både tidlosa och djupt gripande. Precis som Kafka med sina manuskript hade Åke sjalv aldrig avsikten att någonsin visa dem for någon, for honom var de bara ovningar. De riktiga tavlorna skulle komma sen. En film om kreativitet och sjukdom och en omojlig karlekshistoria liksom historien om målningarnas mirakulosa upptackt liksom broderns forfalskningar. Med bland annat Lars Lerin, Maria Taube och Ragnar Stromberg. En film av Pontus Hjorthen, 2023.

programme.title: Arbbediehto _ den skogssamiska kåtan
programme.desc: En skogssamisk kåta tar form i Lappstaden i Malå, dar Jorgen Stenberg och Magnus Antaris Tuolja anvander enbart handverktyg och ursprungliga metoder. Med yxan i hand glantar de på dorren till den samiska kulturen, filosoferar om traditionell kunskap och tid och blir forhoppningsvis klara till stamningshelgen i augusti.

programme.title: Inblick
programme.desc: Han blev årets dragspelare 2024. Den forsta från Tornedalen. Och dragspelet har foljt honom i over 40 år. Nu vill han hitta nya, musikaliska vagar och har kontaktat några av Norrbottens basta musiker for att bilda Fredrik Hangasjarvi orkester.

programme.title: Hur snatchar man 50 000 av en rom?
programme.desc: Programledaren Louie Marti samlar Trubbeltanja, Lisa Siden och Jonathan Johansson for att utforska det romska språkets påverkan på svenskan. Med hjalp av språkexperten Eva får de lara sig romska ord och delta i en quiz for att tjana pengar. Louie inser att han inte kan saga "gurka" på romani, och en myt om romer utmanas på ett humoristiskt satt. Samtidigt får influencerganget en djupare forståelse for romsk kultur och historia. Medverkande: Trubbeltanja, Lisa Siden, Jonathan Johansson.

programme.title: Älskade javla svordom
programme.desc: Svordomar finns i alla språk och ar ett satt att uttrycka och forstå, både våra egna men också andras kanslor. Forskning slår också hål på myten kring att svordomar skulle vara kopplat till låg intelligens. Medverkande Sanna Kalla och Rebecka Digervall (The Magnettes) från Pajala, Birger Winsa och Kristy Beers Fagersten.

programme.title: Side om side
programme.desc: Maria forsoker få fart på sin karriar som designer. Under tiden hamnar hela grannskapet i hogsta beredskap nar det blir stopp i deras gemensamma avlopp. Syndaren ska hittas. Kopperud tar till alla medel for att slippa dela på kostnaden. I rollerna: Charlotte Frogner, Egil Hegerberg, Jon Almaas, Marie Blokhus, Vidar Magnussen, Pernille Sørensen, Tore Sagen m.fl.

programme.title: Vinterliv
programme.desc: Beppe Starbrink får hjalp av Peder Karlsson och Jenny Sylven att kora hundspann.

programme.title: Vetenskapens varld
programme.desc: Folj med på en varldsomspannande resa i jakten på havets intelligens. Med ny teknik soker forskare nu svar på hur intelligenta djuren i havet verkligen ar. Resultaten ar hapnadsvackande. Livet i havet staller ibland helt ovantade krav på de varelser som lever dar.

programme.desc: De senaste sportnyheterna, analyserna och fordjupningarna.

programme.title: Ekonomibyrån
programme.desc: Hur påverkas ekonomin och svenska foretag av det som hander i varlden? Vilken effekt får det for dig och din plånbok?

programme.title: Labi kodumaa
programme.desc: Sommaren del 1. Jari och Jani packar simringarna och vander husbilens nos mot de tusentals sjoarna. Reskamraterna njuter av att undersoka den finska sommaren under en ovanligt lång, het period. Solen skiner, glassen smalter och vadret gynnar jordbrukarna. Trevligt att resa, men somrarna ar inte alltid så har. UR.

programme.title: Med våra ogon
programme.desc: Sittande bordtennis, delikata desserter och alltingslokaler. Vi traffar konstnaren Elín Sigríður María som arbetar med "Konst utan granser" och Hákon Atli och Jona Kristín som ar parabordtennismastare. Vi får aven en rundtur i det nya riksdagshuset av riksdagsordforanden och besoker restaurang Nautholl for att smaka på udda specialiteter. UR.

programme.title: Agenda
programme.desc: Direktsant fordjupande samhallsprogram om aktuella handelser i Sverige och varlden.

programme.title: Side om side
programme.desc: Maria forsoker få fart på sin karriar som designer. Under tiden hamnar hela grannskapet i hogsta beredskap nar det blir stopp i deras gemensamma avlopp. Syndaren ska hittas. Kopperud tar till alla medel for att slippa dela på kostnaden. I rollerna: Charlotte Frogner, Egil Hegerberg, Jon Almaas, Marie Blokhus, Vidar Magnussen, Pernille Sørensen, Tore Sagen m.fl.

programme.title: Älskade javla svordom
programme.desc: Svordomar finns i alla språk och ar ett satt att uttrycka och forstå, både våra egna men också andras kanslor. Forskning slår också hål på myten kring att svordomar skulle vara kopplat till låg intelligens. Medverkande Sanna Kalla och Rebecka Digervall (The Magnettes) från Pajala, Birger Winsa och Kristy Beers Fagersten.

programme.title: Sportnytt
programme.desc: De senaste sportnyheterna, analyserna och fordjupningarna.

programme.title: Nyhetstecken
programme.desc: Nyheter på teckenspråk.

programme.title: Библия 365
programme.desc: Проповеди Алексея Осокина - это ободряющее Слово Божье на каждый день. Оно поможет Вам в христианской жизни быть победителем и иметь успех. Христианская проповедь - это мотивация жить полноценной жизнью в последние дни перед Восхищением Церкви и Вторым Пришествием Иисуса Христа.

programme.title: Измени свой мир. Рик Реннер
programme.sub-title: Берегитесь, чтобы никто не прельстил вас
programme.desc: Главная особенность программы – глубокий и детальный разбор Божьего Слова. Изучение текстов оригинала Нового Завета на греческом языке поможет лучше понимать Библию, по-новому раскроет для вас многие стихи Писания. Вместе с Риком Реннером вы углубитесь в историю Библии, сможете переместиться в древний Ефес, Пергам, Смирну, Иерусалим, Вифлеем, а также во многие другие исторические места, чтобы прочувствовать обстановку, в которой авторы библейских текстов писали свои послания. Эти послания не перестали быть актуальными и сегодня!

programme.title: "Драгоценные жемчужины" с Рикком Ренером на каждый день
Joyce Meyers program
programme.desc: Джойс Майер проповедует на самые различные темы, в том числе о силе мыслей и слов, о важности правильного мышления, о душевных состояниях человека и взаимоотношениях. Её проповеди больше напоминают искренний разговор с аудиторией — она открыто говорит о своей жизни, делится пережитым, рассказывает, чему научил её Бог, чтобы и другие могли применить эти знания и откровения к своей жизни.

programme.title: "Драгоценные жемчужины" с Рикком Ренером на каждый день
Uskliku võiduhaal
programme.desc: Кеннет Коупленд вместе со своей супругой являются авторами и ведущими программы "Победоносный голос верующего", которую транслируют телекомпании по всему миру. Кеннет Коупленд проповедует на темы основанные на Библии о вере, любви, исцелении, процветании, искуплении, праведности и о принципах победоносной христианской жизни. Коупленд убежден, что Бог никогда не ошибается, в отличие от человека. Он считает, что человек может разговаривать с Богом даже о повседневных делах. Кеннет Коупленд утверждает, что каждый человек, который принимает Иисуса Христа своим Богом и спасителем, благодаря вере может стать успешным, получить исцеление от болезней и решение финансовых нужд.

programme.title: Louder
programme.desc: A journey across generations, eras, and genres, anchored by female musical icons, whose songs, voices and activism inspired the fight for equality.

programme.title: Minu elu ulekaalulisena
programme.desc: Ever thought you ought to lose a few pounds? These 600lb individuals certainly have, and are about to undergo a year long fitness and diet regime in a desperate attempt to get their weight under control again. Patients are placed under the care of Iranian-American surgeon, Doctor Now, who trains them in the ways of a healthy diet, before aiding their journey with surgery if they need it by means of gastric bypass surgery or sleeve gastrectomy. Follow each person on their journey to a healthy weight.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress UK
programme.desc: All women want to be beautiful, especially on their own wedding day. From an early age girls all over the world dream of a fairy white dress. Reality TV show Say Yes to the Dress UK shows the agency Confetti and Lace that assists brides in choosing the Gown according to any taste and purse. It is not that easy as not only the Bride must fall in love with the Gown but her friends and relatives as well. With the Welsh fashion designer David Emanuel, the designer of Princess Dianas iconic wedding dress, the host Christine Dando and their professional staff pre-wedding jitters have no chance. These experts go above and beyond to help the future brides to find the one and only wedding dress.

programme.title: Minu imeline elu ulekaalulisena
programme.desc: This reality series follows the life of Whitney Way Thore, a woman that weighs 170 kg, who became popular when videos of her dancing became viral with more than eight million views on YouTube. After getting diagnosed with polycystic ovary syndrome, which she partially blames for her weight gain, Whitney tries to make the best of her new world, overcoming everyday difficulties and shaking off the "haters" through dance and laughter.

programme.title: Minu imeline elu ulekaalulisena

programme.title: Extreme Sisters
programme.desc: Everyone loves their siblings and has a special bond with them, but these women take it to the next level. Meet several sets of sisters with the most obsessive and inseparable relationships, and see how they live and what challenges they face, from eating the same foods, to sharing beds, sometimes even boyfriends, and much more.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress UK
programme.desc: All women want to be beautiful, especially on their own wedding day. From an early age girls all over the world dream of a fairy white dress. Reality TV show Say Yes to the Dress UK shows the agency Confetti and Lace that assists brides in choosing the Gown according to any taste and purse. It is not that easy as not only the Bride must fall in love with the Gown but her friends and relatives as well. With the Welsh fashion designer David Emanuel, the designer of Princess Dianas iconic wedding dress, the host Christine Dando and their professional staff pre-wedding jitters have no chance. These experts go above and beyond to help the future brides to find the one and only wedding dress.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: This programme aims to explore the complicated issues that can happen when teenage pregnancy suddenly happens. Focusing on three girls, the camera captures each trimester and the first few weeks of parenthood. Each couple is completely unprepared for what is about to happen when they become parents which is where each set of grandparents comes in handy. Tensions become high as everyone has their own set of rules on what the "perfect" parent should be like and what the future beholds for the young parents to be.

programme.title: Unexpected

programme.title: Loren and Alexei
programme.sub-title: Loren and Alexei: After the 90 Days
programme.desc: A 90 Day Fiance spin-off that focuses on Loren and Alexei Brovarnik, a couple that first appeared on the third season of the original show, and got married in 2016. Loren and Alexei have a son Shai Josef, and in this programme, viewers have a chance to follow their lives as they prepare to welcome their second child.

programme.title: Õdedest abikaasad
programme.sub-title: Love Is Patient, Love Is Kind
programme.desc: Reality show that follows lives and adventures of the Brown family, who are polygamists - father and husband Kody Brown, his four wives Meri, Janelle, Christine, and Robyn, and their 18 children. Dont miss a chance to see how their unique daily routine looks like, how they face various difficulties and fight societal prejudices, while trying to live like a normal family.

programme.title: The Baldwins
programme.desc: A look into the lives of Alec and Hilaria Baldwin and their seven children as they navigate the highs and lows of family life in the public eye.

programme.title: Darcey and Stacey
programme.desc: Twins Darcey and Stacey have always done everything together; They got married at the same age, divorced on the same day, raised their families in the same home and have always shared a mutual love for dating men overseas; but this could be about to change as Darcey struggles to put her toxic relationships behind her, Staceys Albanian fiance is on his way to America and they have 90 days to wed!

programme.title: The Culpo Sisters
programme.desc: The girls head to Rhode Island for the opening of their family restaurant. Plus, Sophia opens up about the pressure she feels as Olivias sister.

programme.title: Pisipõnnid ja tiaarad
programme.desc: Explore the world of child beauty pageants of fake teeth, lip-gloss galore and hair extensions as parents dress their children up to take home the winning title. Exploring different locations around the USA, Toddlers and Tiaras shows the tantrums of children, the long hours they have to endure and the training that comes alongside being a winner. With seven seasons, TLC (The Learning Channel) have created another American reality television series that shows the realities of what it takes to become a winner in Americas child beauty pageants, and the money it takes to win!

programme.title: The 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: In a spin off of the US series 90 Day Fiance, Americans move to foreign countries to pursue romances and get married. In the original show, partners move into the US on a K-1 visa and have 90 days to settle before the wedding due to the visa process. This spin off sees US citizens applying for their own visas abroad, experiencing culture shocks and leaving behind their entire families for their fiance. These engagements arent without drama, secrets and lies come to light and relationships are tested to the extreme. Will these Americans find happiness and love abroad, or will they be booking a flight back home?

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: Can you find you husband or wife in the short space of 90 days? What will it actually take for you to marry your person, EVEN before you ever met them? Watch various couple as they head off on the adventures of a lifetime trying to find their significant other as well as attempting to try and establish a personal relationship something they have been talking to online. Follow them on their journey travelling to meet the person they have been talking to. Will this turn out to actually be beneficial or a big waste of time? What will happen next?

programme.title: MILF Manor
programme.desc: Reality Show - Ep. 10. Single women dive into a unique dating experience, hoping to find love in a beautiful retreat in Canada. But a shocking twist turns their world upside down.

programme.title: The Bad Foot Clinic
programme.desc: Theres Trouble Afoot. Marion and Kenny wage war on beastly bunions. Plus, they combat stubborn verrucae, persistent calluses, and fungal nails that have outstayed their welcome.

programme.title: Veidrad kehad
programme.desc: Body Bizarre is a documentary series presenting stories of people from all over the world who are suffering from unusual and mysterious disease states. Some of people need surgery that is so risky that the chances of survival are small. Some of the conditions are so rare and unstudied, that the best doctors are just puzzled and cant do anything to help. Discover the real stories of individuals living with the most incredible medical anomalies.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.sub-title: This Is Zit: More Pesky Pilars
programme.desc: Definitely not created for the squeamish, Dr Pimple Popper features dermatologist and Internet celebrity Dr. Sandra Lee as she treats patients suffering with unique skin conditions such as facial and skin disorders. Including the extraction of blackheads, cysts and uncovering new skin conditions that audiences may not have known of before, Dr. Sandra Lee started uploading content onto Youtube and Instagram, gaining a lot of popularity by people enjoying spots and cysts being popped. Those included within her videos gave written permission for her to record and post the content in exchange for discounted or free-treatments. Dr. Pimple Popper is on a mission to reclaim the lives of those suffering with these unusual and rare skin condition and remove their embarrassment.

programme.title: Outdaughtered
programme.desc: Adam and Danielle Busby are unique; they are the only parents, on record in the United States, to have all-girl quintuplets. In this series, we follow the loving husband and wife as they embark on a challenge like no other: parenthood. Adam, or Buzz as he is sometimes called, is one lonely guy, outnumbered by his kin of women. With girls Olivia, Ava, Riley, Parker, Hazel, eldest child Blayke and of course, wife Danielle, Adam must learn to embrace his feminine side. Whether its juggling work and home life, battling illnesses and ailments or deciding where to send the girls to school, the family are faced with tough decisions every day, and soon learn that their life as they knew it has changed forever.

programme.title: Extreme Sisters
programme.desc: Everyone loves their siblings and has a special bond with them, but these women take it to the next level. Meet several sets of sisters with the most obsessive and inseparable relationships, and see how they live and what challenges they face, from eating the same foods, to sharing beds, sometimes even boyfriends, and much more.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress UK
programme.desc: All women want to be beautiful, especially on their own wedding day. From an early age girls all over the world dream of a fairy white dress. Reality TV show Say Yes to the Dress UK shows the agency Confetti and Lace that assists brides in choosing the Gown according to any taste and purse. It is not that easy as not only the Bride must fall in love with the Gown but her friends and relatives as well. With the Welsh fashion designer David Emanuel, the designer of Princess Dianas iconic wedding dress, the host Christine Dando and their professional staff pre-wedding jitters have no chance. These experts go above and beyond to help the future brides to find the one and only wedding dress.

programme.title: De Frogers
programme.desc: The entire Froger family travels to Englands South Coast by campervan and with caravans to go a convivial family camping trip.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With an average weight of over 1000lbs, nothing can support the Slaton sisters like they can support each other. With hopes of a healthier life, the sisters embark on a journey to drop enough weight that they qualify for a life changing bariatric surgery. Without the surgery, Amy will never be able to become a mother like she dreams of, and Tammy will be bedridden. After meeting with medical experts, the sisters strive to reach their goal but drama ensues as they struggle to stick to their healthy diets. Will the Slaton sisters stay on the right track and turn their lifestyles around?

programme.title: 90 paeva pulmadeni
programme.desc: Buckle up, TLC and 90 Day Fiance fans! Hot off their upcoming appearance on 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER?, fan-favorites Pedro and Chantel and their lively in-laws will be the focal point of a spinoff series from the 90 DAY FIANCÉ franchise called THE FAMILY CHANTEL, premiering Monday nights this July. Ever since Chantel first introduced Pedro to her family under the false pretense of him coming to America on a student visa, the drama that followed has kept fans obsessed. From their beginnings on 90 DAY FIANCÉ season four through 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER, Pedro and Chantel have weathered major marital ups and downs involving everything from feisty family members to their own trust issues. Viewers will follow this unique modern family as they try to move past their differences and come together as an extended family, but as Chantels parents Karen and Thomas try to protect their brood, will they push their children too far? The family members featured in the upcoming series include Chantels parents Karen and Thomas and siblings River and Winter, as well as Pedros mother Lidia and sister Nicole.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: Can you find you husband or wife in the short space of 90 days? What will it actually take for you to marry your person, EVEN before you ever met them? Watch various couple as they head off on the adventures of a lifetime trying to find their significant other as well as attempting to try and establish a personal relationship something they have been talking to online. Follow them on their journey travelling to meet the person they have been talking to. Will this turn out to actually be beneficial or a big waste of time? What will happen next?

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Pisipõnnid ja tiaarad
programme.desc: Florida brings out great competition for their Little Miss Glitz Pageant. From top performances to constant tantrums, it is anyones guess who will win.

programme.title: Return to Amish
programme.desc: American reality television series, a spin-off and continuation series to Breaking Amish, that features original cast members- Abe and Rebecca Schmucker, Jeremiah Raber, and Sabrina High, who return to Pennsylvania and try to adjust to living in their Amish communities once again, facing new struggles as they come to terms with the fact that life doesnt get any easier after leaving communities behind. We also get to meet some new and interesting people, friends and family members of the original cast and follow the life of Kate Stoltz who decided to stay in New York and pursue her modeling career.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. For some of these couples, the real drama is just starting because they barely know each other and they have to battle critics, doubters, and various obstacles on their road to love. Some of the couples that are featured on the show are Danielle and Mohamed, Melanie and Devar, Loren and Alexei, Kyle and Noon, Brett and Daya and Russ and Paola.

programme.title: Alta Infedeltà
programme.desc: How does a scorned lover react when their partner is revealed to be a traitor? This show re-enacts the betrayals, secrets and lies that lead couples to a breaking point.

programme.title: Baylen Out Loud
programme.desc: Colin seeks Baylens parents blessing to propose to her. Baylen and her parents meet with a neurologist to discuss Deep Brain Stimulation.

programme.title: Long Islandi meedium
programme.desc: Reality series where Theresa Caputo, a self-professed medium, claims she can communicate with dead people. Each episode demonstrates how this gift impacts her life and the lives of those around her. Theresa helps individuals connect with their departed loved ones which results in emotional, heartwarming, and sometimes heartbreaking readings with her fans and some celebrities. People are looking for a closure and piece, and Theresa helps them as much as she can.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Portals To Hell

programme.title: Haunted Towns
programme.desc: The TWC team (Tennessee Wraith Chasers) travel across the US to investigate stories of hauntings and horrors, attempting to establish whether there are supernatural forces at play or if theyre just folklore. The team is made up of Chris Smith, Steven McDougal, Scott Porter and Brannon Smith. Together they interview witnesses and gather evidence, uncovering the fact behind the fiction to decipher what or who is causing the hauntings. These paranormal places are scattered across America and have long claimed to have spooky pasts; the team hope they can solve the mysteries once and for all. Reality series.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: Hair-rising American reality series that follows paranormal investigators Jason Hawes, Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango, known from the Ghost Hunters television series, as they respond to calls from people who need their help with the cases of reportedly haunted locations around the United States. The guys are members of the paranormal investigation group- T.A.P.S., which Hawes founded, and they helped to create United Paranormal Research Organization (UPRO), which aims to be a global paranormal investigation organization that keeps local organizations connected. Using state-of-the-art technology, strict methodology and local contacts, the team tracks down the source of the unexplained phenomena and cracks each outrageous case.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: This documentary crime show is about uncovering and seeking out the truth into the mystery of the most shocking disperse that have taken place over the years. The cold case that no one seem to be able to solve laving people to believe in the supernatural and family wondering why and how. Leaving the people left be hide baffled and to try to discovery what has happen. To do this they will use the science and technol of today to try to uncover what has taken place on these mystery day. Follow the presenter as he deep dive into to the world of the unknown.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: Selles "NASA mõistatuste" osas: Astronoomid on šokeeritud, kui avastavad peaaegu nahtamatu musta augu. Hiiglasliku asteroidi Cerese pinnalt avastatakse jaavulkaan. Miljardar, kes ehitab NASA-le kosmose riistvara. Millised on tulevased kosmoselapsed? Vene raketiga Sojuzi rahvusvahelisse kosmosejaama sõitnud ameeriklast tabab katastroofiline rike.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses attempt to unlock the mystery of the Alaska Triangle, a remote area infamous for alien abductions, Bigfoot sightings, paranormal phenomena and vanishing airplanes. Throughout the series, we meet a woman whose idyllic Alaskan dream soon descends into a paranormal nightmare, as she starts to suffer attacks by an unseen force. Recent sightings may prove that a Native American legend about a mysterious race of giants is true. The series also explores The Missing Douglas and whether an interdimensional portal in the Alaska Triangle led to the disappearance of the airplane carrying 44 military personnel in 1950.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: Apollo 12 astronaudid toovad kuult tagasi midagi elusat. NASA teeb maale lahenevat asteroidi jalgides ootamatu avastuse: tegu ei ole asteroidi vaid maavalise eluga.

programme.desc: Kui Hiina kuukulgur katki laheb ja NASA teadlased asjaolusid uurivad avastavad nad tundmatu materjali, mis arvatavasti saboteeris Apollo missioone juba aastakumneid tagasi. Kosmoselaev Rosetta leiab komeedi, mis tundub laulvat.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

programme.title: Hotel Secrets and Legends
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates the secrets and legends hidden in the rooms of many hotels, motels and resorts in America. With two million hotel rooms occupied every night in America, its no wonder that some of the most captivating tales have occurred in hotels. Each episode includes dramatic recreations featuring actors re-telling the most mysterious, outrageous and strange stories and legends from Americas history that have occurred either inside the rooms, or near famous and even not-so-famous hotels.

programme.title: Hotel Secrets and Legends
programme.sub-title: Space Race and Surviving The Everglades
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates the secrets and legends hidden in the rooms of many hotels, motels and resorts in America. Each episode includes dramatic recreations featuring actors re-telling the most mysterious, outrageous and strange stories and legends from Americas history that have occurred either inside the rooms, or near famous and even not-so-famous hotels.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: The Haunted Museum
programme.desc: A paranormal investigator faces great danger when she attempts to unravel the mystery of a haunted doll with the power to harm anyone who lays eyes on it.

programme.title: Terror in the Woods
programme.desc: The great outdoors is full of mystery and beauty, but nobody expects to run into paranormal entities or monstrous creatures during a normal day out. This documentary series examines terrifying tales where individuals have found themselves coming into contact with unexplained phenomena. What was supposed to be a pleasant trip soon turns into a nightmare, and with dramatic reconstructions, their frightening ordeals are brought to life. Each episode explores a respective story, featuring interviews with the individuals involved alongside the re-enactments.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses attempt to unlock the mystery of the Alaska Triangle, a remote area infamous for alien abductions, Bigfoot sightings, paranormal phenomena and vanishing airplanes. Throughout the series, we meet a woman whose idyllic Alaskan dream soon descends into a paranormal nightmare, as she starts to suffer attacks by an unseen force. Recent sightings may prove that a Native American legend about a mysterious race of giants is true. The series also explores The Missing Douglas and whether an interdimensional portal in the Alaska Triangle led to the disappearance of the airplane carrying 44 military personnel in 1950.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: This documentary crime show is about uncovering and seeking out the truth into the mystery of the most shocking disperse that have taken place over the years. The cold case that no one seem to be able to solve laving people to believe in the supernatural and family wondering why and how. Leaving the people left be hide baffled and to try to discovery what has happen. To do this they will use the science and technol of today to try to uncover what has taken place on these mystery day. Follow the presenter as he deep dive into to the world of the unknown.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: Äsja avastatud dokumendid avalikustavad NASA plaan B kuule maandumise jaoks. Astronaut Peggy Whitsonit transportiv Sojuz kapsel kaob jalgi jatmata. NASA Cassini missioon avastab kolmesajaaastase olevuse.

programme.title: Treasure Quest
programme.desc: Documentary follows the fascinating employees of Odyssey Marine Exploration and their search for the lost ships in the English Channel. The ambitious crew is led by company CEO Gregory Stemm and Tom Dettweiler. The aim is to find and recover the greatest shipwreck treasures as well as have a look at the never-seen-before shipwrecks and tell their untold stories to the world.

programme.title: Treasure Quest
programme.desc: Documentary follows the fascinating employees of Odyssey Marine Exploration and their search for the lost ships in the English Channel. The ambitious crew is led by company CEO Gregory Stemm and Tom Dettweiler. The aim is to find and recover the greatest shipwreck treasures as well as have a look at the never-seen-before shipwrecks and tell their untold stories to the world.

programme.title: Coopers Treasure
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows explorer Darrell Miklos and his team as they set out to find the treasure that was located by astronaut Gordon Cooper from space in 1963. In the 1960s, Gordon Cooper was one of NASAs space pioneers, breaking the record for the longest space flight while completing a 122 hour mission. While in space, Cooper took thousands of photographs of Earth. In the Caribbean, Cooper noticed a number of anomalies and kept notes of locations. He suspected these were ship wrecks full of treasures and he spent years researching and documenting his findings, and prior to his death, shared his findings with his long-time friend Darrell Miklos. Now, with a team of experienced explorers, Darrell is determined to continue the search and hopefully find Coopers treasure.

programme.title: Jaakulm kuld
programme.desc: Re-join the hardy American prospectors as they go for gold as the massive ice sheet melts on Greenland, revealing immense mineral wealth in the virgin rock.

programme.title: Jaakulm kuld
programme.desc: American miners are tough guys who arent scared of anything at all. They prospect for precious metals and gems in remote parts of Greenland never before imprinted by the foot of man. Those lands are rich in natural gas, gold, silver, platinum, and precious minerals, all treasures are hiding deep below the glacial ice sheets.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle

programme.title: The Osbournes Want to Believe
programme.desc: The Osbourne family return in another reality series, this time fronted by Jack as he shows to Ozzy and Sharon some of the craziest, inexplicable videos of paranormal activity caught on camera. Although Ozzy may occasionally look like a frightening spectre, he is not the star of this series, as the videos demonstrate bizarre instances of supernatural events, with Jack testing his parents lack of beliefs when it comes to the unknown. These unexplained events have perplexed and baffled experts for years, but will Ozzy and Sharon become believers? Or will they dismiss the videos as explainable?

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror
programme.desc: The team find links between the bloody history of Anaconda, Montana, and Gunslinger Gulch. A trek into the hills has medium Sarah fearing for everyones safety.

programme.title: Kummituslik varjupaik
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: Kummituste laboratoorium
programme.desc: Ghost Lab is an American paranormal TV series revolving around ghost-hunting brothers Brad and Barry Klinge, the founders of Everyday Paranormal- a paranormal investigation team. Their mission is to visit the most haunted places in America in order to study and investigate the afterlife and its questionable existence. The team use various equipment during their investigations, such as thermographic cameras, infrared cameras, digital audio recorders, data loggers, motion detectors, and other high tech gear.

programme.title: Armastuse saar

programme.title: Minu imeline muutumine
programme.desc: Oma imelise muutumise loo jutustab 45 aastane Monika Algma Tallinnast. Monika ei soovi veeta oma edasise elu paevi diivaninurgas, tool ja televiisori ees. Maailmas on nii palju asju, mida teha ja kogeda kahekesi. Selleks, et enda kõrvale kedagi leida, on Monikal vaja usku endasse. See usk kadus aga koos teadmisega, et ta on Lontkõrv ja et mahajaetud naisena pole tal teiste silmis endist vaartust. Monika loodab, et saab labi muutumise endale mitte ainult uue valimuse vaid ka uue enesekindluse .Ta ei kavatse jaada elu lõpuni mahajaetud naiseks.

programme.title: Elustiil
programme.desc: Pidulikumas saates "Elustiil" viib Mark Anatoli Ein vaatajad Eesti Vabariigi aastapaeva auks toimunud suururitusele. Televaatajaid ootavad õnnitlused meie presidendi vastuvõtult.TV3 Life eetris olev autorisaade "Elustiil" annab vaatajatele võimaluse sukelduda muinasjutulisesse ilu-, moemaailma ning olla kursis olulisemate seltskonna- ja avalike sundmustega, mis toimuvad Eestis ja valismaal.

programme.title: Power Hit Radio
programme.desc: Power Hit Radio - NON. STOP. MUSIC.

programme.title: Armastus
programme.desc: Haarava sundmustikuga seriaali kuuendas osas saame teada, kui kaugele on noored valmis armastuse nimel minema ja millega tuleb Martinil Sandra suudluse nimel riskida. Kuldar Kivi on mures Martinist unistava tutre tuleviku parast ja sulgeb tudruku koduaresti. Ärganud kirg muudab Sandrat, kuid oma soovide nimel on ta endiselt kõigeks valmis. Kuldari noor abikaasa Karin kompab lubatu ja lubamatu piire, Harmakosu hobutalus otsivad Marta ja Keiu kadunud sudamerahu. Sandra ja Martini jaoks on aga oluline uksnes kõikevõitev tunne, sest nad teavad, et armastus soosib seda, kes on valmis tema eest võitlema.

programme.title: Armastus
programme.desc: Tunnetest ja romantikast tulvil hoogsa sundmustikuga seriaali seitsmendas jaos toovad Kuldar ja Karin mangu ootamatu kulalise, kelle abil ahvatleda Sandrat Martinist loobuma. Harmakosu hobutalus veenab Marta poega lollused unustama ja linnatudruku jatma. Marta soovitusel paneb Keiu Martinit võludes mangu kogu imelise relvastuse, millega loodus on teda naisena õnnistanud. Clifil ja Tomil saab aga siiber, et mingi maakast toll nende õde nillib ning vaprust kogunud vennakesed otsustavad Martini fuusiliselt paika panna. Berit toimetab omasoodu, uritades sõbranna Liisult poiss-sõpra ule luua. Ent olgu või terve maailm nende armastuse vastu, Sandrat ja Martinit see ei kõiguta.

programme.title: Jamie ja Jimmy kokandusvõistlus
programme.desc: Kulinaariakuninganna Mary Berry laheb nostalgilisele mereandide pidusoogi malestusrajale. Jimmy kupsetab mini veiseliha Wellingtoni.

programme.title: Dr Browni loomakliinik
programme.desc: Saates saame jalgida veterinaarkirurgi Chris Browni toimetamist Bondi Junctioni loomakliinikus, erakorralise veterinaararsti Lisa Chimesi ja eriarsti Andrew Marchevsky tegusid SASH-is Sydney eeslinnades ning Tim Faulkneri tegevust Austraalia reptiilipargis.

programme.title: Oivaline jooga
programme.desc: Oivaline jooga on inspireeritud jumalikest energiavormidest ja iidsetest lugudest India mutoloogiast.

programme.title: Krista lood
programme.desc: Vivika sõbranna Ingrid unistab teise lapse saamisest, aga tal on vaike probleem: Ingrid on vallaline ja sobivat meest pole hetkel kusagilt võtta. Kui ta sellest Vivikale raagib, torkab tollele pahe esialgu suureparasena tunduv idee. Vivika pakub valja, et Ingrid võiks lapse saada tema mehe Siimuga, Kahjuks pole keegi valmis selleks, et Siimule mõjub uus ettepanek sootuks omamoodi.

programme.title: Kallid kalorid
programme.desc: Emotsionaalne ja riukalik kaalusaade, kus ulekaalulised inimesed pannakse eriti talumatusse olukorda. Nad lahevad treeninglaagrisse, kus kesksel kohal on rammusaid ahvatlusi tais kulmik. Selle umber hakkabki elu kaima, sest iga amps ja lonks sellest kapist maksab hingehinda, mis arvutatakse maha saate auhinnarahast. Kes julgeb kapist siidri võtta, teades, et see maksab 200 eurot ja vahendab võidusummat? Esimeses osas saavad osalised uksteisega tuttavaks, ega tea veel ahvatluste kapi tahendust.

programme.title: Minu imeline muutumine
programme.desc: Oma imelise muutumise loo jutustab 45 aastane Monika Algma Tallinnast. Monika ei soovi veeta oma edasise elu paevi diivaninurgas, tool ja televiisori ees. programme.title: Buduaar
programme.desc: Kaasahaarav ning humoorikas telesaade Buduaar toob Sinuni selle kõige kuumemad ilu-, moe- ja elustiili uudised. Ülipõnevate avastuste ja kasulike nõuannetega vurtsitatud telesaadet juhib iluhoolik ja jumestuskunstnik Reet Harmat.

programme.title: Parim moelooja
programme.desc: Disainerid lahevad igivana vembu õnge, kui Christian Siriano kutsub nad kokteile jooma ja nad avastavad, et tegelikult on kaes valjakutse aeg. Tegemist on ebatavalise valjakutsega, kus disainerid peavad looma paris kokteilibaarist elegantse kokteilikleidi. Selle VIP-peo kulaliste nimekirjas on kohtunikuks uks moemaailma põnevamaid disainereid Christopher John Rogers.

programme.title: Naudime elu
programme.desc: "Naudime Elu" on meelelahutussaade kogu perele, mis tutvustab põnevaid elamusi, mõnusaid tegevusi ja varskendavaid uudiseid. Sarav saatejuht Meisi Volt veedab mõnusalt aega, kulastades huvitavaid Eestimaa paikasid

programme.title: Hull sinu jarele

programme.desc: Sari keskendub New Yorgis elava abielupaari katsumustele.

programme.title: Meisterkokk
programme.desc: Hooaja esimeses oskuste proovilepanekus õpetab "Meisterkoka" saatejuht, kohtunik ja produtsent Gordon Ramsay kodukokkadele, kuidas krabi puhastada. Võistlejad, kes sellega ise hakkama ei saa, osalevad valjakutses, kus peavad valmistama Gordon Ramsay firmarooga - krabilihaga kukleid. Žurii otsustab, kes jaab ja kes koju laheb.

programme.title: Jamie ja Jimmy kokandusvõistlus

programme.title: Elu laheb edasi
programme.sub-title: Tagasi, tagasi, tagasi... See on lainud!
programme.desc: Ryan on valmis uuest kohtingutele minema ja muudab oma Facebooki suhtestaatust. Rannavõrkpalli olumpiavõitja kutsub ta oma sõpradega kohtuma. Danny aitab Sonial oma kassi leida. George tahistab oma sunnipaeva.

programme.title: Paradiisihotell
programme.desc: Esimesed võistlejad registreeruvad hotelli ja kohtuvad oma uute toakaaslastega.

programme.title: Rosamunde Pilcher
programme.desc: Kaunis modell Jessica Marsh ootab abieluettepanekut oma advokaadist peigmehelt Oliver Rymanilt, kuid too ei kiirusta ennast siduma. Fotosessioonil Devonis tutvub Jessica salaparase orelimeistri Max Barnesiga ja tekib vastastikune tõmme. Jessica naaseb siiski Oliveri juurde, kes teeb oma karjaari huvides Jessicale abieluettepaneku. Kui mees peagi parast pulmi abielurikkumisega vahele jaab, põgeneb Jessica Devonisse ja kohtub jalle Maxiga.

programme.title: Aurora Teagardeni musteeriumid
programme.desc: Aurora Teagarden on vaikelinna raamatukoguhoidja, kes kuulub ka kohalikku paris mõrvalugusid arutavasse klubisse. Aurorale pole kunagi kull detektiiv Jack Burns meeldinud, ent kui mees sureb, tunneb naine vajadust seda juhtumit uurima hakata, et detektiivi nimi puhtaks pesta ning leida tapja. Samal ajal peab ta aga dešifreerima isikliku sõnumi, mis on seotud omaparaste ja ohtlike juhtumitega, mis ta umber toimuvad.

programme.title: Hiilgav detektiivitar

programme.desc: Leonardo ja Sara ei suuda enam uksteisega koos olla.

programme.title: Vaprad ja ilusad
programme.desc: Ridge, Eric ja Steffy mõtlevad valja plaani, kuidas Carter ja Hope havitada.

programme.title: Kes on mu issi?
programme.desc: Endine eksootiline tantsija toob enda kauaaegse kliendi kohtu ette. Ta soovib tõestada, et mees on ta 15-kuuse tutre bioloogiline isa.

programme.title: Skandaal
programme.desc: Rowani tagasitulek tõstab panuseid nende jaoks, kes uritabad B613 agu saada. Fitz peab vastu võtma tahtsa seaduseelnõu.

programme.title: Armastus
programme.desc: Hoogsa sundmustikuga romantilise seriaali Armastus avaosas kohtub miljonar Kivi tutar Sandra uusi valjakutseid otsiva maapoisi Martiniga. Piisab ainsast pilgust, laitmaks noorte sudameis armastust, kuid eneseteadlik Sandra ei taha tunnistada tõmmet lihtsa kelneri poole, poiss aga ei julge uskuda, et suutis kaunis ja uhkes tutarlapses tundeid aratada. Kaimas on ettevalmistused Kuldar Kivi sunnipaeva suurejooneliseks tahistamiseks. Lesestunud arimehe uus valjavalitu, verinoor kaunitar Karin, puuab Kuldari taiskasvanud poegadele ja tutar Sandrale tõestada, et nuud on tema selles majas perenaine. Sunnipaevapidu saab sisse tõelise hoo ja lõppeb pauguga. Sandra sudamesse jaab Martinit meenutama magus igatsus ning soov taas kohtuda. Suurima armastusloo toovad ekraanile Marko Matvere, Lisabet Loigu, Oskar Seeman, Desiree Mumm, Grete Paia jt. Režissoor Henrik Normann, stsenarist Ivo Parbus.

programme.title: Minu uus kodu
programme.desc: Üks suhtepartner tahab maja maha muua ja uude kolida, aga teine partner tahab oma praegusesse koju jaada. Andrew Winter naitab partneritele kolme kinnisvara, mille saaksid praeguse kodu asemel osta. Neale Whitaker renoveerib nende praeguse maja, et veenda neid koju jaama. Parast renoveerimist peab paar teada andma, kas tahab jaada või maja maha muua.

programme.title: Padjaklubi
programme.desc: Katte jõuab Kristina sunnipaev, tudrukud peavad plaani, mida talle kinkida. Kristina on hadas oma valimusega. Misha salajane lemmikloom kulvab korteri peal paksu pahandust. Laura sukeldub kapslikohviarisse. Ilmub ootamatu sunnipaevaline, muutes Kristina sunnipaeva veelgi kohatumaks.

programme.title: Hiilgav detektiivitar
programme.desc: Politseijaoskonnas koristajana tootaval Morganeil on 160 IQ kuid see pole teda igapaevaelus kunagi aidanud. Ta otsustatakse palgata politseisse, et ta aitaks neil tabada vaga intelligentseid kurjategijaid.

programme.title: Krista lood
programme.desc: Vivika sõbranna Ingrid unistab teise lapse saamisest, aga tal on vaike probleem: Ingrid on vallaline ja sobivat meest pole hetkel kusagilt võtta. Kui ta sellest Vivikale raagib, torkab tollele pahe esialgu suureparasena tunduv idee. Vivika pakub valja, et Ingrid võiks lapse saada tema mehe Siimuga, Kahjuks pole keegi valmis selleks, et Siimule mõjub uus ettepanek sootuks omamoodi.

programme.title: Jamie ja Jimmy kokandusvõistlus
programme.desc: Kulinaariakuninganna Mary Berry laheb nostalgilisele mereandide pidusoogi malestusrajale. Jimmy kupsetab mini veiseliha Wellingtoni.

programme.title: Papad Mammad
programme.desc: Papadel mammadel on aeg omavahelistest tulinatest ule saada ja tegus uhisrinne moodustada, sest noored tulevad valjamaalt tagasi ja naib, et Lenna ema-isa abielu on tõsises ohus. Papad-mammad panevad nuud uljalt pead kokku, et noored uuesti lepitada ja sellest sunnib nii mõnigi muhk ja mõlk, aga peamine on, et laste ja lastelaste õnn ikka paastetud saaks. Suhtepaastmine paneb maatalus kogu suvise suhtepoti kõrgematel tuuridel podisema ja tegevusse kaasatakse naabridki.

programme.title: Kirgede kaevandus
programme.desc: El Tigre uurileandja teatab, et peab ta valja tõstma.

programme.title: Naise kattemaks
programme.desc: Asya saab teada, et ta abikaasa on teda petnud.

programme.title: Vaprad ja ilusad
programme.desc: Poppy anub Finni, et ta Steffyle Lunast ei raagiks. Luna peab oma emale midagi raakima ja palub Billilt abi.

programme.title: Kaubamaja
programme.desc: See humoorikas komoodiaseriaal raagib ulisuures megapoes tootavast ainulaadsest kollektiivist. Poetootajad, sarasilmsetest algajatest kõike nainud veteranideni, asuvad uhiselt labi huumoriprisma igapaevast tood rugama.

programme.title: Minu uus kodu
programme.desc: Üks suhtepartner tahab maja maha muua ja uude kolida, aga teine partner tahab oma praegusesse koju jaada. Andrew Winter naitab partneritele kolme kinnisvara, mille saaksid praeguse kodu asemel osta. Neale Whitaker renoveerib nende praeguse maja, et veenda neid koju jaama. Parast renoveerimist peab paar teada andma, kas tahab jaada või maja maha muua.

programme.title: Skandaal
programme.desc: B613-st jagu saanud meeskond on tõsises ohus ja sunnitud võtma drastilisi meetmeid oma ohutuse tagamiseks. Mellie on kurnatud, kui rahvas poordub ta vastu ja Cyrus on sunnitud teda kaitsma.

programme.title: Meeleheitel koduperenaised
programme.desc: Konkurentsitult parim ja vaadatuim sari maailmas sai tuntuks tanu oma teravale ja seksikale satiirile. Ameerika aarelinnas elavate koduperenaiste saladuslikust elust pajatav sari uhendab endas parimaid draama ja komoodia elemente, pakkudes televaatajatele ulimalt põnevaid ja intrigeerivaid elamusi. Sarja keskseteks tegelasteks on neli sõbrannat: meestevihkajast uksikema Susan Mayer, endine karjaarinaine ning nuud nelja lapse ema Lynette Scarvo, perfektsionistist pereema Bree Van De Kamp ning luksust armastav eks-modell Gabrielle Solis. Pealtnaha paistab nende elu kui ilus pilt postkaardil- toredad lapsed, armastav mees ja ilus maja. Kuid tegelik elu koduperenaistena on sootuks teine. See on idulliline elu tais uksindust, meeleheidet ja ebakindlust. Suurim soov, mis neid naisi uhendab, on valja paaseda nende suletud uste tagant, et leida õnn ja meelerahu.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Caroline Flack tutvustab uhiuusi noori vallalisi, kes on valmis oma elu parimaks suveks villas. Avalikkus peab otsustama, kes neist armastust otsib ja kes on seal ainult raha parast.

programme.title: Kes on mu issi?
programme.desc: 33-aastane naine kohtub esimest korda elus oma potentsiaalse bioloogilise isaga.

programme.title: Power Hit Radio
programme.desc: Power Hit Radio - NON. STOP. MUSIC.

programme.title: Kirgede kaevandus
programme.desc: El Tigre uurileandja teatab, et peab ta valja tõstma.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: USA 2020 romantiline komoodia, draama Lavastaja:Autumn de Wilde Osades: Anya Taylor-Joy, Johnny Flynn, Mia Goth Rahutu seltskonnalõvi Emma, kes on ules kasvanud sundmustevaeses rikkuses keset unise Highbury kulakese maalilist ilu, leiab endale uue meelierutava hobi kohaliku kosjamoorina. Olles asja edukalt mehele pannud oma guvernandi, saab neiu uueks kaaslannaks nooruke ja naiivne preili Harriet Smith (Mia Goth). Algab uus kosjasobitamise mang, mis seekord sugugi nii ladusalt ei kulge. Paraku laheb loosi ka Emma enda suda ning segi aetud peadega vaarikaid noorsande saab tiirlema umber noorte daamide rohkem kui õrnahingelised preilid arvanud oleks. Kes kellele see kõige õigem on, see on suurim kusimus.

programme.title: 2 aastat armastust
programme.desc: Romantiline komoodia. Samantha on tuntud raadiohaal, kes juhib populaarset suhtenõustamissaadet. Ta ise on juba pea kaks aastat olnud abielus Johniga ning naise bioloogiline kell tiksub juba usna haalekalt. John arvab aga, et beebijuttudega pole mõtet kiirustada. Mida rohkem Samantha Johni survestab, seda tõrjuvamaks abikaasa muutub. Peagi on suhtenõustajal endal suhtenõud tarvis, sest nende abielu loob erimeelsuste tõttu kõikuma.

programme.title: Midsomeri mõrvad
programme.desc: Kohalik heidik, kes mõisteti aastaid tagasi mõrvas õigeks, võetakse viimasena operatsioonijargse sudamerehabilitatsiooniklubi liikmeks. Parast ta saabumist hakkavad liikmetega juhtuma kummalised sundmused.

programme.title: Nurgakivi
programme.desc: Priit ja Eero Valge seiklevad taaskord ehitusmaailmas. Otsivad põnevaid nippe ja annavad kasulikke nõuandeid. Saatest ei puudu ka "Meistrite nurk", kus seekord nokitsevad mehed millegi vaga põneva kallal.

programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: TV3 uudistetoimetus võtab igal õhtul operatiivselt ja asjatundlikult kokku olulisemad paevasundmused nii Eestist kui ka mujalt maailmast. "TV3 uudiste" ankrud on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Tarmo Maiberg ja Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Eluga Hispaaniasse
programme.desc: UUS HOOAEG! Algamas on "Eluga Hispaaniasse" kolmas hooaeg ning kuna Veronika ja Harri on ise juba udini Paikeseranniku usku, siis nuud on paar võtnud vastu otsuse meelitada kodumaalt Hispaaniasse veel uhe Eesti pere. Just seetõttu on kolmanda hooaja fookuses pere uus ettevõtmine, mida nimetatakse moodsalt kinnisvara "flippimiseks". Veronika ja Harri puuavad leida vana maja, millel oleks potentsiaali, et see lille luua ja siis maha muua.

programme.title: 6 kangelast
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui ootamatu katastroof tabab San Fransokyo linna ja paiskab Hiro ohtude keskele, võtab poiss appi Baymaxi ning oma lahedased sõbrad, adrenaliinisõltase Go Go Tomago, puhtusearmastaja Wasabi, keemiavõlurist Mesi-Sidruni ning kooli maskotist teadusefann Fredi. Selleks, et lahendada ahvardav mõistatus, muudab Hiro oma sõbrad kõrgtehnoloogiliste kangelaste ruhmaks nimega "6 kangelast".

programme.title: 6 kangelast
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui ootamatu katastroof tabab San Fransokyo linna ja paiskab Hiro ohtude keskele, võtab poiss appi Baymaxi ning oma lahedased sõbrad, adrenaliinisõltase Go Go Tomago, puhtusearmastaja Wasabi, keemiavõlurist Mesi-Sidruni ning kooli maskotist teadusefann Fredi. Selleks, et lahendada ahvardav mõistatus, muudab Hiro oma sõbrad kõrgtehnoloogiliste kangelaste ruhmaks nimega "6 kangelast".

programme.title: Shrek Kolmas
programme.desc: USA 2007 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Chris Miller, Raman Hui Osades (haaled):Peeter Tammearu, Tiit Sukk, Mait Malmsten, Harriet Toompere jt. Fionaga abielludes polnud Shrekil aimugi, et seetõttu peab ta uhel paeval võibolla kuningaks hakkama. Kui Shreki aiapapa, kuningas Harold korraga lahkub, ootab teda just see au. Valja arvatud juhul, kui Shrek (koos oma ustavate kaaslaste Eesli ja Saabastega Kassiga) leiaks enda asemele sobiva kuninga. Kõige lubavam kandidaat oleks Fiona nõbu Artie, keskkoolis õppiv ebakuninglik hadavares, kellest vaarilise trooniparija kasvatamine naib olevat uks raskemaid ulesandeid, millega Shrek ja sõbrad eales silmitsi seisnud on.

programme.title: Kolmekas
programme.desc: TV3 reedeõhtuse jutusaate "Kolmekas" uus hooaeg stardib juba veebruari viimasel õhtul. Üllatusi jagub esimesest hetkest, sest saatejuhtide kolmikus on muudatusi – Grete Kulla ja Andres Puusepa kõrval võtab koha sisse Rene Puura.

programme.title: Üle ja umber
programme.desc: Üle ja umber Kesk-Ameerika seiklus saab uue poorde, sest Onu Raiu haarab rooli enda katte ja kihutab autoga labi pori! Teel tutvutakse kohaliku indiaanihõimu traditsioonidega ja proovitakse taime, mis teeb suu tuimaks. Rannakul kohatakse abivajajaid ning reisiauto uueks missiooniks saab hadaliste aitamine. Peale karastavat suplust kose all otsustab maasturikokk Mart soogitegemisel vee asemel õlut kasutada ning leiab seltskonnale kohviistanduse, kus tutvutakse mahekohvi valmistamisega.

programme.title: Aardekutid
programme.desc: UUS! Kodumaa veekogud ja maapõu varjavad endas uskumatuid aardeid, hammastavat ajalugu, aga ka kopsakat kogust rampsu ning jahmatavalt eluohtlikke leide.Muusik Robin Juhkental ja autoentusiast Kristjan Ojang võtavad ette ranga ja kannatustnõudva otsimisretke, keeravad põnevuse põhja ja sukeldavad poorastesse seiklustesse! Algavad otsingud, kus spetsialistide abiga leitakse nii maa alt kui maa pealt uskumatuid aardeid. Saab nalja, naeru, aga ka ehedat hirmu ja pettumust.

programme.title: STOP!
programme.desc: Saatejuht Allan Muuk hoiab katt pulsil liiklusteemadel, mille ring on lai ning pidevas muutumises. Allan toob kokkuvõtlikult valja nadala probleempunktid, kajastades neid nii liiklusspetsialistide kui lihtsa inimese vaatenurgast. Saates jagatud infot taiendavad usaldusvaarsed faktid, selgitavad intervjuud ning operatiivsed reportaažid.

programme.title: Kevad Kolmes
programme.desc: Kevad koputab uksele, seda koos varskete telesaadetega. TV3 kevadkava toob vaatajateni nii naeru kui ka tõsiseid sissevaateid argiellu, aga ka seiklusi mitme maa ja mere tagant. Juri Pootsmann viib vaataja telgitagustesse ja kergitab veidi saladusloori selle kevade kõige põletavamalt kusimuselt - kes on maski taga.

programme.title: See pole lastesaade
programme.desc: "See pole lastesaade" on varjatud kaameratega filmitud saade, milles jalgitakse, kuidas lapsed ja taiskasvanud kaituvad, kui kontroll situatsiooni ule kaest hakkab libisema. Kummad saavad paremini hakkama? Tallinna Loomaaeda kulastama tulnud lapsed kohtavad inimlooma. Mida teha, kas vaikselt vaadata või Mati Kaalule helistada?Laura kutsub jutule teravmeelse ja teravkeelse Evelyn Sepa. Selguvad nii mõnedki ootamatud seigad Keskerakonna suvepaevadelt.Kaire Vilgats leiab enda ja oma auto akki keset laste labiviidavat performancet.

programme.title: Midsomeri mõrvad
programme.desc: Kui Barnaby ja Winter lahevad vaiksele saarele uurima lauamangude tootja mõrva, jaavad nad sinna tormi tõttu vangi, ilma internetita ning koos ohtliku mõrvariga. Nii tuleb neil loota vaid oma hallidele ajurakkudele, et õigel ajal mõrvar tabada.

programme.title: Taavi Katiga Indias
programme.desc: UUS! Taavi otsib endale reisikaaslast suurelt telecastingult, kuhu kandideeris ligi 600 soovijat ning kohale tulnud seltskond on tõeliselt kirju. Sõelale jaab kolm tõeliselt varvikat tegelast, kellest uhe Taavi valja valib ja meile ka lahemalt tutvustab. Seiklus Indiasse saab alguse ning juba reisi esimene paev kostitab eestlasi mahlakate ullatustega.

programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: TV3 uudistetoimetus võtab igal õhtul operatiivselt ja asjatundlikult kokku olulisemad paevasundmused nii Eestist kui ka mujalt maailmast. "TV3 uudiste" ankrud on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Tarmo Maiberg ja Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Maskis laulja
programme.desc: UUS HOOAEG! Juba jargmisel puhapaeval kuuleme esmakordselt, kuidas kõlavad tanavused uhiuued maskis lauljad. Enne seda kiikame eksklusiivselt saate telgitagustesse, et naha, missugused salaparased maskid sel kevadel võistlustulle astuvad. Samuti saame tuttavaks uute detektiividega. Millist taktikat kavatsevad nad kasutada, et lauljad tabada, ning milliseid saravaid tahti kahtlustavad nad juba praegu? Olge tahelepanelikud, sest esimesed vihjed on kavalalt peidetud juba tanasesse erisaatesse. Kevade põnevaim arvamismang võib alata!

programme.title: Ansambel Vitamiin kontsert "Viimane vaatus"
programme.desc: Legendaarne ansambel Vitamiin andis ulimenuka ja uhtlasi ka oma viimase kontserti. Omaaegse menubandi huvastijatukontserti piletid Alexela Kontserdimajja muudi valja vaid mõne hetkega. Aga nuud on TV3e vaatajatel suureparane võimalus sellest meeleolukast, retrohõngulisest, hitte tais õhtust siiski osa saada. 35 aasta jarel astusid taaskord uheskoos lavale ansambli armastatud lauljad ja muusikud: Marju Lanik, Siiri Sisask, Mikk Targo, Peeter Vahi, Rein Laaneorg, Andres Oja, Mait Maltis, kulalisesinejana Elina Nechayeva ja paljud teised. Kontserdil kõlasid bandi tuntumad hitid: "Linda", "Tiigrikutsu", "Jatke võtmed valjapoole", "Lolita", "Must kohv", "Taas loovad kellad", "Hookus-pookus" jpt. Kontsert oli ulimenukas, kuid kahjuks jai see viimaseks!

programme.title: Luurespetsid
programme.desc: USA/ Hiina 2016 komoodia/ marul Lavastaja:Rawson Marshall Thurber Osades:Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Amy Ryan, Aaron Paul Calvin Joyner (Kevin Hart) oli oma kooli au ja uhkus. Kakskummend aastat hiljem on ta edukas raamatupidaja, kes on ullatunud, kui temaga võtab uhendust Bob Stone. Selgub, et tegelikult on tegu Robbie Wheirdichtiga (Dwayne Johnson), keda teismelisena nende koolis kiusati. Bob on kakskummend aastat trenni teinud ning on nuud tahtis CIA agent. Ta palkab Calvini appi, et leida ta raamatupidamisoskuse abil seade, mis võib USA luurele havitavalt mõjuda. Ebatavaline paar jaab vastase relvadele ja arvukusele alla, ent suudab nad siiski ule kavaldada.

programme.title: Lõppmang
programme.desc: Lunastust otsiv vang põgeneb vanglast. Doak mõtleb valja erilise plaani.

programme.title: Seaduse nimel
programme.desc: Pargist leitakse mõrvatuna suure tehnoloogiaettevõtte tegevjuht. Price ja Maroun tootavad selle nimel, et lahti harutada pettevõrk.
